seo.title: Search places
seo.description: You can find a specific place or select only the region of Belarus and you will be get a map with all the objects in this region. In addition, you will have the opportunity to set a radius around the given region or point.

noResults: Unfortunately, your search returned no results.

locationSearch.title: Location
locationSearch.description: Specify the location within the radius of which the search will be carried out.

routeSearch.title: Route
routeSearch.description: Enter the starting and finishing locations of your trip to find out what interesting places you will meet along the way.
